===Glyph origin===
{{Han etyl}}
{{Han compound|言|吾|ls=psc|c1=s|c2=p}}.

As the original form of {{lang|zh|語}} ({{zh-l|*吾}}) was borrowed for other meanings, a new character was created to represent the original meaning of {{lang|zh|吾}}. This new character was created by combining the original character with the semantic element {{zh-l|*言}}.
